data.name: break
data.doc: This tag will [i]break[/i] a loop such as [tag]while[/tag], [tag]for[/tag]. When Moya encounters this tag, it jumps to the statement after the loop.
data.example:
<let crew="['John', 'Rygel', 'Scorpius', 'Aeryn']"/>
        <for src="crew" dst="character">
            <if test="character == 'Scorpius'">
                <echo>Taking off before Scorpius gets on board!</eco>
                <break>
            </if>
            <echo>${character} is on board</echo>
        </for>
